data_table.description: CHD Derived Variables. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: WCARICDX
variable.description: Worst computer myocardial infarction diagnosis for hospitalized event [CHD Derived Variable Dictionary - Events Cohort]
variable.comment: WCARICDX is a character variable determined by the largest value of CARCDXX2 within a cohort event. For out-of-hospital deaths (linked or unlinked), WCARICDX is missing. For example, if an event consists of 3 hospitalizations, and the computerized MI diagnosis (CARCDXX2) for each hospitalization has value 1, 3 and 5, then WCARICDX = 5. WCARICDX (for cohort surveillance) is an analogy to WARICDX (for community surveillance). Purpose: to determine the worst computer MI Diagnosis for hospitalized events among cohort participants.

variable.name: CMIDX
variable.description: Myocardial infarction classification of an event [CHD Derived Variable Dictionary - Events Cohort]
variable.comment: CMIDX is the final myocardial infarction classification variable determined by MMCC reviews or computer algorithm if MMCC reviews are not required. Unlinked out-of-hospital deaths have CMIDX=NO-HOSP (no hospitalizations). Purpose: to determine a myocardial infarction diagnosis for hospitalized events among cohort participants.

variable.name: SUDTH1
variable.description: Sudden cardiac death within 1 hour from onset of symptoms [CHD Derived Variable Dictionary - Events Cohort]
variable.comment: SUDTH1 is determined by HRA25g or (DTH09, DTH11, HRA11a and HRA11b) for in-hospital deaths (IHD). It is determined by MMCC reviews (MDX15b/CDX15b) for out-of-hospital deaths (OHD). SUDTH1 is defined for a subset of fatal events with the following fatal classifications: definite fatal MI, definite fatal CHD and possible fatal CHD. A classification of SUDTH1 exists for both community and cohort events. Information from the most current batch is used to define SUDTH1 when there are multiple batches of reviews (due to data changes). IHD: death time is defined by HRA25g (time from onset of this event to death), or by the difference between death time (DTH09/11) and admission time (HRA11a/b) if HRA25g is unknown. If death time is missing and the length between death date and admission date is greater than one day, then death time is greater than 24 hours. Purpose: identify fatal events as 'Sudden Cardiac Death', defined by death within 1 hour from onset of acute symptoms.
variable.value: Death time* from event is less than 1 hour

variable.name: SUDTH24
variable.description: Sudden death within 24 hours from onset of acute symptoms [CHD Derived Variable Dictionary - Events Cohort]
variable.comment: SUDTH24 is determined by HRA25g or DTH09, DTH11, HRA11a and HRA11b for in-hospital deaths (IHD). It is determined by MMCC reviews (MDX15b/CDX15b) for out-of-hospital deaths (OHD). Purpose: identify fatal events as 'Sudden Cardiac Death', defined by death within 24 hours from onset of acute symptoms.
variable.value: Death time* from event is less than or equal to 24 hour

variable.name: CDTHYR
variable.description: Year of death [CHD Derived Variable Dictionary - Events Cohort]

variable.name: CEVTYR
variable.description: Event year [CHD Derived Variable Dictionary - Events Cohort]

variable.name: CESFYR
variable.description: Earliest year of cohort surv events [CHD Derived Variable Dictionary - Events Cohort]

variable.name: CMIYR
variable.description: Year of myocardial infraction [MI] [CHD Derived Variable Dictionary - Events Cohort]

variable.name: CEVTFU
variable.description: Follow up days to event since baseline [CHD Derived Variable Dictionary - Events Cohort]

variable.name: CMIFU
variable.description: Follow up days to myocardial infraction [MI] since baseline [CHD Derived Variable Dictionary - Events Cohort]

variable.name: CDTHFU
variable.description: Follow up days to death since baseline [CHD Derived Variable Dictionary - Events Cohort]

variable.name: CEVTAGE
variable.description: Age at event [CHD Derived Variable Dictionary - Events Cohort]

variable.name: CMIAGE
variable.description: Age at myocardial infraction [MI] [CHD Derived Variable Dictionary - Events Cohort]

variable.name: CDTHAGE
variable.description: Age at death [CHD Derived Variable Dictionary - Events Cohort]

variable.name: CESFDATE_DAYS
variable.description: Earliest date to define event year of cohort event-days from exam 1 [CHD Derived Variable Dictionary - Events Cohort]

variable.name: CEVTDAT3_DAYS
variable.description: Event date-days since exam 1 [CHD Derived Variable Dictionary - Events Cohort]

variable.name: CMIDATE_DAYS
variable.description: Date of myocardial infraction [MI] for cohort event-days from exam 1 [CHD Derived Variable Dictionary - Events Cohort]

variable.name: DTHDATE_DAYS
variable.description: Date of death for an event - days from exam 1 [CHD Derived Variable Dictionary - Events Cohort]

variable.name: GWAS_ID
variable.description: ARIC subject ID [CHD Derived Variable Dictionary - Events Cohort]
